entities.name: madam marsh
entities.description: Madam Marsh is a passenger on the Knight Bus who is not feeling well. She retches and makes a horrible spattering sound, indicating she is ill.

entities.name: stan
entities.description: Stan is the driver of the Knight Bus who helps Madam Marsh out of the bus.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a passenger on the Knight Bus who catches a glimpse of the Hog's Head in Hogsmeade.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin helps Harry and others off the bus with their luggage.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks helps Harry and others off the bus with their luggage.

relationships.description: Stan helped Madam Marsh out of the bus.
Lupin helped Harry off the bus with his luggage.
Tonks helped Harry off the bus with his luggage.
Lupin and Tonks are colleagues who work together to help passengers off the bus.
Harry arrives at Hogwarts with the Knight Bus.
